item.title: Social Security recipients getting double payments this October due to calendar scheduling quirk
item.description: The Social Security Administration will send two SSI payments in October 2025, with one payment on Oct. 1 and another on Oct. 31 due to the 2025 calen...

item.title: HelloFresh meals may contain listeria-tainted spinach, USDA warns
item.description: HelloFresh is recalling two ready-made meals after the USDA issued an alert about the meals containing spinach possibly contaminated with listeria.

item.title: Burbank, California airport goes without air traffic controllers for hours amid government shutdown
item.description: A staffing shortage left the Hollywood Burbank Airport in California without air traffic controllers for hours on Monday night, prompting long flight ...

item.title: The US economy saw 'essentially no job growth' last month: Moody's
item.description: Moody's Analytics chief economist Mark Zandi warned that U.S. job creation is slowing as the government shutdown prevented the release of the BLS' Sep...

item.title: Rite Aid closes down all remaining stores after bankruptcy
item.description: Rite Aid has permanently closed all stores after filing for bankruptcy twice in two years, ending the pharmacy chain's 60-year operation in the U.S.
